text: Dr. Anthony Fauci, in response to a Q from Sen. Warren on what the overall U.S. death toll is likely to be said, "We are now having 40-plus thousand new cases a day. I would not be surprised if we go up to 100,000 a day if this does not turn around. And so I am very concerned."
